pr_title: Create ADT event routes sample, add missing sync client APIs

timeline.message:
Create ADT event routes sample, add missing sync client APIs

Async client had deleteEventRoute APIs, but sync client didn't

timeline.bodyText: I had to add this extra command line parameter because, in order to create an event route, you must have one pre-existing event route endpoint. Creating a new event route endpoint for the user would require the control plane SDK.
timeline.author: timtay-microsoft

replies.bodyText: It is marked as optional both because other samples don't need this value, but also because the event route sample can still do some operations without this value
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: This should take Context as a parameter no?
timeline.author: azabbasi

timeline.bodyText: why the empty spaces? if you intend to tab in , use \t ?
timeline.author: azabbasi

replies.bodyText: Ah, good thinking. I'll just \t instead
replies.author: timtay-microsoft
